Manifest:
<ApplicationManifest xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ApplicationTypeName="VisualObjectsApplicationType" ApplicationTypeVersion="16.0.0" ManifestId="61ae05ee-f68c-46db-b472-853abb1f3d37" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2011/01/fabric">
 <Parameters>
    <Parameter Name="VisualObjects.ActorService_MinReplicaSetSize" DefaultValue="2" />
    <Parameter Name="VisualObjects.ActorService_PartitionCount" DefaultValue="10" />
    <Parameter Name="VisualObjects.ActorService_TargetReplicaSetSize" DefaultValue="3" />
    <Parameter Name="VisualObjects.WebService_InstanceCount" DefaultValue="1" />
    <Parameter Name="CpuCores" DefaultValue="4" />
    <Parameter Name="CpuSharesA" DefaultValue="512" />
    <Parameter Name="CpuSharesB" DefaultValue="512" />
    <Parameter Name="MemoryA" DefaultValue="1000" />
    <Parameter Name="MemoryB" DefaultValue="100" />
    <Parameter Name="MemoryC" DefaultValue="1" />
    <Parameter Name="MemoryD" DefaultValue="azk10" />
  </Parameters>
  <ServiceManifestImport>
    <ServiceManifestRef ServiceManifestName="VisualObjects.ActorServicePkg" ServiceManifestVersion="3.0.0" />
    <Policies>
      <ServicePackageResourceGovernancePolicy CpuCores="[CpuCores]" CpuCoresLimit="12"/>
      <ResourceGovernancePolicy CodePackageRef="CodeA1" CpuShares="[CpuSharesA]" MemoryInMB="[MemoryA]"  MemoryInMBLimit="1000"/>
      <ResourceGovernancePolicy CodePackageRef="CodeA2" CpuShares="[CpuSharesB]" MemoryInMB="[MemoryB]" MemoryInMBLimit="[MemoryC]"/>
      <ResourceGovernancePolicy CodePackageRef="CodeA2" CpuShares="[CpuSharesB]" MemoryInMBLimit="[MemoryC]" MemoryInMB="[MemoryB]"/>
    </Policies>
  </ServiceManifestImport>
  <ServiceManifestImport>
    <ServiceManifestRef ServiceManifestName="VisualObjects.WebServicePkg" ServiceManifestVersion="12.0.0" />
    <ConfigOverrides />
  </ServiceManifestImport>
  <DefaultServices>
    <Service Name="VisualObjects.ActorService" GeneratedIdRef="e9ba88d7-7199-42f5-94fc-f093573f46c5|Persisted">
      <StatefulService ServiceTypeName="VisualObjects.ActorServiceType" TargetReplicaSetSize="[VisualObjects.ActorService_TargetReplicaSetSize]" MinReplicaSetSize="[VisualObjects.ActorService_MinReplicaSetSize]">
        <UniformInt64Partition PartitionCount="[VisualObjects.ActorService_PartitionCount]" LowKey="-9223372036854775808" HighKey="9223372036854775807" />
      </StatefulService>
    </Service>
    <Service Name="VisualObjects.WebService">
      <StatelessService ServiceTypeName="VisualObjects.WebServiceType" InstanceCount="[VisualObjects.WebService_InstanceCount]">
        <SingletonPartition />
      </StatelessService>
    </Service>
  </DefaultServices>
</ApplicationManifest>
